issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: New llap commands "llap cluster -info" and "llap cache -purge" require some changes so that Ranger can log the commands for auditing.

comments.body:
- Added SELECT NO GRANT privilege to "llap cluster -info" command so that Ranger can track in audit logs
- Setting up full command string correctly
[~sershe] can you please take look? small patch
cc/ [~rmani]

no auth check for "LLAP CLUSTER INFO" comment seems outdated

+1 otherwise pending tests
